title: Allow importing multi-file GGUF models
summary:
### What is the issue?

Currently Ollama can [import GGUF files](https://github.com/ollama/ollama/blob/main/docs/import.md). However, larger models are sometimes split into separate files. Ollama should support loading multiple GGUF files similar to loading safetensor files.

- Railway (railway.toml)
- Vercel (vercel.json)
- DigitalOcean App Platform (.do/app.yaml)

title: [PR] Create Fine-tune with traces & tools
summary:
## What does this PR do?

Big PR to support fine-tuning with Trace. This PR is based on the work from https://github.com/Kiln-AI/Kiln/pull/758 where a new Trace based Dataset Formatter is introduced. 

* New fine-tune page redesign, split models by function fine-tune capabilities and filter data
